discourse_list.title: Ethereum state trie format change using an overlay

content.content: This is a proposal by @gballet, articles and resources collected here for convenience. “During the 1.x workshop in Paris last weekend, a couple ideas have been discussed for the transition from hexary tries to binary tries. It has been agreed that each proposal should be published on ethresearch for comparison and further discussion.” Overview article “The proposed process introduces a transition period during which two trees are maintained. This has the advantage that the main chain can keep operating while the tree is being converted, and it also ensures that all accounts will be translated to a binary format.”    Medium – 26 Mar 20    Ethereum state tree format change using an overlay One of the many problems affecting Ethereum is the way accounts and contract data are stored. The structure that has been chosen is called… Reading time: 5 min read       The main discussion for @gballet’s proposed is on ethresear.ch “A hexary to binary conversion method in which new values are stored directly in a binary tree sitting ‘on top’ of the hexary, while the ‘historical’ hexary tree is converted in the background. When the process is finished, both layers are merged.”    Ethereum Research – 12 Mar 20    Overlay method for hex -> bin tree conversion During the 1.x workshop in Paris last weekend, a couple ideas have been discussed for the transition from hexary tries to binary tries. It has been agreed that each proposal should be published on ethresearch for comparison and further discussion. ... Reading time: 3 mins 🕑 Likes: 12 ❤      "Quick and Dirty" prototype implementation in geth (a pull request)   github.com/holiman/go-ethereum         [PoC] Snapshot to bintrie   holiman:trie_gen ← gballet:snapshot-to-bintrie            opened 03:20PM - 23 Mar 20 UTC               gballet             +1518 -18            Background Understanding Trie Databases in Ethereum    Medium – 5 Mar 19    Understanding Trie Databases in Ethereum Trust me, this will be fun and informative :) Reading time: 15 min read       Modified Merkle Patricia Trie Specification    GitHub    ethereum/wiki The Ethereum Wiki. content.GPT-summary: The proposal by @gballet suggests a transition from hexary tries to binary tries in Ethereum state trie format. The proposal introduces a transition period during which two trees are maintained, and new values are stored directly in a binary tree sitting 'on top' of the hexary, while the 'historical' hexary tree is converted in the background. The proposal has been discussed in the 1.x workshop in Paris and is published on ethresearch for comparison and further discussion. The post also includes articles and resources related to the proposal.
